State.Author: luxor8071
State.Description: New realistic and high quality raindrop Texture for ENB. this new texture makes rain denser, more detailed and finer than my previous version.
State.Name: ENB HQ Raindrops 2

State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete hardcore survival-based overhaul of Fallout 4, rebuilding Fallout 4 gameplay systems, audio, and visuals to play more like STALKER.
State.Name: Lost World - The Ultimate Hardcore Survival S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: TheBigLidowski
State.Description: Adds L96A1 sniper rifle into the game
State.Name: Accuracy International L96A1

State.Author: Subleader - Gage Broussard - Partisan - Oh Deer
State.Description: This mod adds the Benelli M2 Shotgun to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization, leveled list, compatible with both BCR and Tactical Reload.
State.Name: Agency Arms Benelli M2 - Shotgun

State.Author: Aloot
State.Description: A re-release of Aloot's amazing Home Plate overhaul! This is an overhaul of the Player Home in Diamond City, aka Home Plate. The interior has been reworked, and the home now behaves just like any other settlement. You can send Companions and NPCs there and add Home Plate to the supply chain and much much more!
State.Name: Aloot's Home Plate

State.Author: AnotherOne aka RetroPaladin
State.Description: Not a little patch or addon, but new weapon. Again?
State.Name: AnotherOne TEC-9

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description:
Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

Don't expect big changes since I want this to be as much compatible as possible and to let users choose their own sound mods. If you want to help and/or advice of better ways, please let me know.
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Backpack system to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth

State.Author: zestoflemon
State.Description: A BF4 44 Magnum animation and sound set for the vanilla .44 Pistol
State.Name: BF4 44M

State.Author: Subleader and The Campers
State.Description: This mod adds the B&T APC and  MP Smg to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization and leveled list.
State.Name: BT APC9 - MP9 Combo

State.Author: TheBigLidowski
State.Description: An alternative to the vanilla missile launcher with custom animations, sounds, leveled list integration, and a lot of different ammo types, switchable in the field.
State.Name: Cazador Missile Launcher

State.Author: NexusAU gir4892
State.Description:
A Holotape Cheat Menu that lets you add Caps, Stimpaks, any of the Crafting Materials, SPECIAL Points and More!

Also available for Xbox One on Bethesda.net
State.Name: Cheat Terminal

State.Author: whisper
State.Description:
***NO PRECOMBINES BROKEN***



With this you can remove the bramble-junk, vines, piles of leaves, seaweed, and some of the brick and debri junk in your settlements while in workshop mode. Or use a craftable holotape (Chemistry Workbench) to remove it all automatically.
State.Name: Clean My Settlement REDUX

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: This mod adds eight small, no-frills way station player homes to various locations in the Commonwealth, each with its own unique style. All stations feature workbenches linked to common storage, clean water sources and beds that give the Well Rested/Lover's Embrace bonuses.
State.Name: Commonwealth Express Courier Stations

State.Author: cVc
State.Description: This workshop add-on pack adds 1000s of unique, lore friendly items to build in your settlements. Script injected, adding a new menu 'cVc'
State.Name: cVc Dead Wasteland

State.Author: cVc
State.Description: This workshop add-on pack adds 1000s of unique, lore friendly items to build in your settlements. Script injected, adding a new menu 'cVc'
State.Name: cVc Dead Wasteland

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: The definitive edition of Armor and Clothing Overhaul, Crafting Framework and Quick Gun Modification, combined in a single plugin. Extensive and fully modular but lightweight equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO)

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

Original.Name: FallEvil - Zombie Mega Pack Main File-59293-1-2-1663969670.rar

State.Author: Arroganz
State.Description: Final released one of my biggest projects to date. Includes zombies from RE 2 Remake, Umbrella Chronicles, Racoon City, and the original RE 1 Remake. This is no April Fools joke...

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: THE NIGHTS ARE DARK AND FULL OF FERALS. If the player is not safe at a defended workshop during the night, large packs of feral ghoul hunters will chase the player from dusk 'till dawn.

Hello Wastelanders ! J.D here, and today, i humbly present you your new safe places : The saferoom !

State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

Original.Name: Vivid Weathers - Weathers and Seasons for Fallout 4-15466-2-23-1663420490.7z

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description:
This is a complete LORE FRIENDLY Weather and Climate Overhaul for Fallout 4! 

It will add more than 75 new Weathers with over 110 new cloudtextures to the Fallout 4 World for you to experience. 

It also improves the general Image quality by adding new LUT and Imagespaces to the game as well as a Player home and base to complete the Lore!

State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.

State.Description: Adds buildable, snappable barbed-wire topped security fences to the Workshop Fences menu.  Variants have sheet metal screening or concrete block reinforcement.  Script-added menu plays nicely with other mods.  Now with pre-war variants and auto-closing gates.  Versión en español disponible.

Adds wearable flashlight gear to the wasteland.



+ 8 Unique models

+ 10 Distance settings

+ Craftable bulbs

+ Dynamic shadows

+ Volumetric light

+ Automatic leveled list integration
State.Name: Tactical Flashlights

State.Author: WOTmodsproductions
State.Description: Adds spawn points all across the map where Ghouls will spawn based on the area, Cities have more zombies while outside of cities are slightly safer, includes name change to zombies and headshot kills zombies only ESP, as well as optional replacer files to replace raiders, gunner and some creatures for an even bigger zombie apocalyse
State.Name: The Running Dead - Customisable Zombie Apocalypse Mod

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.

Burst Impact Blast FX MOD changes the fallout4 particle effect.

Fallout 4 Effect is not cool. So I change it coolly like the latest FPS game.

All the resources I modified are those included in Fallout 4.
State.Name: Burst Impact Blast FX

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which keeps game going in real-time while menus are open. This plugin is highly customizable,  you can toggle on/off every menu's unpause behavior via MCM.
State.Name: Fallsouls - Unpaused Game Menus

State.Author: Phlunder
State.Description: Vanilla-friendly retexture of all object LOD resources in the base game and DLCs.

State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: If you're using a mod that makes the nights dark, you've probably seen them: White ripples on black water during dark rainy nights. This mod fixes this by making those ripples dark as well.

State.Description:
This is the All In One pack requested by you all which includes 'Red Rockets Glare REDONE', 'Starlight Drive-In And Diner', 'Bus Stop

Lighting', and 'Illuminated Billboards' (Vanilla and All DLC Version). It is compatible with all other 'Lighting Series' mods that contain their own page, such as 'Radioactive Signs - Lighting'.

Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.

State.Description: Bethesda's INI configuration files are a mess. BethINI optimizes the game for increased graphical fidelity and performance.

Obligatory Crocodile Dundee Reference.



Adds 3 new knives, integrated into leveled lists, and each knife had 3 total mods.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description: Let it shine through.

State.Author: gabgone - spncryn

This mod adds in a set of armour that functions almost exactly like a set of power armour -- including Pain Train support, footsteps, impact landing, and nearly all mods -- except it's an exoskeleton and looks like a regular set of armour.



Also intended to be used as a framework for other modders looking to easily create similar sets.

State.Author: Gopher
State.Description: HUD when you need. Hide when you don't.

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: Your world, your story. Adds a personal journal that you can type in. Keep track of things you've discovered, chart your journey across the Commonwealth, or write about your daily adventures!

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description:
Are you sick of scrapping your settlements to the ground so you can build on them? Me too.



One click of a button in a holotape - gone in sixty seconds! (Depending upon the power of your gaming rig.)
State.Name: Raze My Settlement

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: FastStart a new game in less than 2 minutes from Main menu > Looks menu > SPECIAL menu > Outside Vault 111 with most mod added inventory items. This is a scripted bypass, not a static savegame so you get full player customisation and fresh RNG.
State.Name: SKK Fast Start new game

State.Description: A gore and blood overhaul for Fallout 4.

State.Author: Kelt

my video creepy Main Menu for Fallout 4 (final version)



                                                       -----------------   REMEMBER, that your Endorsements please me and will help to think up the new ideas     ----------------

Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

State.Author: whisper
State.Description:
***NO PRECOMBINES BROKEN***



With this you can remove the bramble-junk, vines, piles of leaves, seaweed, and some of the brick and debri junk in your settlements while in workshop mode. Or use a craftable holotape (Chemistry Workbench) to remove it all automatically.
State.Name: Clean My Settlement REDUX

State.Author: Tali Redmint
State.Description: This mod modify some Vanilla perks. Fun, Balanced and 100% optional, pick everything or just 1 perk.
State.Name: Creative Perks

State.Author: cVc
State.Description: This workshop add-on pack adds 1000s of unique, lore friendly items to build in your settlements. Script injected, adding a new menu 'cVc'
State.Name: cVc Dead Wasteland

State.Author: Ethganz - Ethnet and Arroganz-
State.Description: Starting the new year off strong. Adds more than seven new creatures to the Feral Ghoul faction that makes them much more challenging but funner to fight.
State.Name: FGEP - Feral Ghouls Expansion Pack

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: GCM allows you easily set many game settings without the need of additional ESPs or console commands.
State.Name: Game Configuration Menu

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Updates 30+ locations so they look like humans could actually survive in them.
State.Name: Hunkered Down - Commonwealth Overhaul

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Wind, rumble and a bit of paranoia
State.Name: Inner City Ambience - An Urban Soundscape

State.Author: Boric123
State.Description: A highly detailed Nepalese style machete, with 4K and 2K texture variants.

State.Author: Chefs Camp
State.Description: Outfit ports from Modern Warfare 2 Remastered
State.Name: MW2R Shadow Company

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This small mod simply hides all instances of power armor frames, pieces, loot, and power armor workbenches. This is intended for use with complete overhauls which do not plan to use power armor in any way whatsoever.

This does not affect NPCs which spawn with power armor.

All Hot Rod magazines are disabled as well.
State.Name: No Power Armor - NOPA

Original.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul - ALL DLC-10189-1-6e.zip

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Makes weapon sounds more realistic for player and NPCs. Improves and balances ambiance and reverb to be more realistic and lively.  Increases the diversity and dynamics of in-game sound.  Fixes numerous issues. Lightweight and compatible with all sound replacer mods.
State.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul

State.Author: Nova
State.Description: The Steyr AUG, a modular Austrian bullpup with variants ranging from SMG to LMG and everything in between.
State.Name: Steyr AUG A3 -  Modular Assault Rifle

State.Author: falloutkid12
State.Description:
Aligns the exterior world lighting with the sun and moon and allows the game to cast shadows at shallower angles. Includes a script that automatically reduces shadow intensity at sunrise and sunset for a more realistic environment.



COMPATIBLE WITH ALL WEATHER MODS AND ENBs!

REQUIRES FAR HARBOR AND NUKA WORLD!

VERSION 2 REQUIRES
State.Name: Sunlight Alignment Tweak - Better Dawn and Dusk

Original.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics v2.0.1 (minor update)-12220-2-0-1.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Night Vision / Thermal / Targeting HUD goggles and eyepieces with new meshes and HD textures. Fully modular, craftable, upgradeable. 3 vision effects, 8 colors, and 2 additional targeting enhancements. Schematics posters also in the Workshop!

Original.Name: Wildwood Cemetery Tombs ESL Flagged ESP-51802-1-2-1658752717.zip

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: The definitive edition of Armor and Clothing Overhaul, Crafting Framework and Quick Gun Modification, combined in a single plugin. Extensive and fully modular but lightweight equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO)

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.

State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.

State.Description: The name says it all.
State.Name: RE4 Ammo Pick Up Sound Replacer

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Small, amazing looking player home with the settlement system. All workbenches, tons of custom storage and clutter, mirror to change your appearance, etc.

State.Name: Maxwell's World

State.Author: FX0x01 - F34R - Navaro - Yukzx - Spiffy
State.Description: Adds a highly customizable MK18 CQBR that features a quest, custom sounds, animations in 1st and 3rd person and leveled list integration.
State.Name: MK18 CQBR

State.Author: VKZQ
State.Description: Adds a new type of Feral ghouls that hunt at night. Flees and hides during the day. Optional Yao Guais. Settings holotape.

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Dynamically find and replace virtually any actor(s) with virtually any actor(s) in game to deliver new exciting surprises. Then manage their respawning for yet more surprises over time.

Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: LordZheep
State.Description:
Some options to set if ghouls can sprint or not, change their speed to a variety of settings, and disable some of their lunging and running attacks.

Does not work with DLC ghouls!
State.Name: Slower Ghouls

State.Description: Pre-war multiple grenade launchers now make a comeback with even more bangs. Agile, light-weight and reliable, Fusillade has proven time and time for its function in making targets exploded with extreme prejudice, leaving nothing in your path. In this very wasteland, ones can imagine what else this instrument could serve you in a harsher time.

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: New modular body armor with new meshes & textures for Dogmeat, designed after modern Military and Police K-9 gear.  Craftable side pouches, backpack, ballistic weave, faction patches, and various colors and patterns customized at the standard workbench. Lots of options!

State.Author: zachtan1234
State.Description: Adds a very tactical and very high-speed  Ops-Core FAST Helmet like the ones worn by modern-day/GWOT spec-ops. Comes with M50 Gasmask, 4 colour variants for the helmet and various modifications including optional NVG modes from WTTO. Craftable by player at Chem Stations. Works with most custom hair mods, gasmasks or face accessories.
State.Name: Ops-Core FAST Helmet  - Tactical Headgear Set

Merges GOTTA115's DLC patch and Some Assembly required main esp into one.

Also add support for AWKCR, making it a requirement to install.

Standalone. Original mod not needed.

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: The Subway Safehouse is a large, subway station themed, old-school style player home located in Boston’s Theater District. The load door is in a formerly unmarked courtyard between D.B. Technical High School and Hester's Consumer Robotics. It is fully furnished and functional with many interactive scripted features and custom assets.
State.Name: The Subway Safehouse Player Home

State.Author: leo1515
State.Description: This mod simply adds more Feral Ghouls to the world. I made this mod because i wanted more ghouls in the commonwealth without risking issues in my save or conflicts, I wanted more ghouls in the world but not so many that it changes the game as a whole.
State.Name: Worldwide Ghouls

State.Description: GCM allows you easily set many game settings without the need of additional ESPs or console commands.

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: A high-quality Beretta M9/92FS pistol featuring loads of colors, high-tech modifications, and unique legendaries. All new meshes, textures, and sounds. Designed to be viable for a full play-through.
State.Name: Beretta M9-FS Pistol (92FS)

State.Description: A simple mod that aims to retexture the subway stations and make them look gritty and dirty.

State.Description:
TLDR: Makes all damage variable based on which part you hit.

USES NO SCRIPTS 

Crippling is much easier

Affects all races except robots! Each race is now more dynamic and has unique multipliers!

See video!

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper - Leviathan1753

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description:
Sound mods pack and other tweaks!

Don't expect big changes since I want this to be as much compatible as possible and to let users choose their own sound mods. If you want to help and/or advice of better ways, please let me know.

State.Author: Rob Vogel - fadingsignal
State.Description: Basement Living adds 10 standalone basement & bunker player homes with their own workshops and craftable doors, allowing you to place/enter into them from any settlement!  Just like Home Plate, you can scrap and decorate them how you like. This was done carefully and methodically, does not affect settlements, or require any workarounds.
State.Name: Basement Living - Bunker and Basement Player Homes (with standalone Workshops)

State.Author: Arroganz
State.Description: Final released one of my biggest projects to date. Includes zombies from RE 2 Remake, Umbrella Chronicles, Racoon City, and the original RE 1 Remake. This is no April Fools joke...

State.Author: Subleader - Gage Broussard - Partisan - Oh Deer

State.Description: A mod that changes the road textures to be darker, and sharper.

State.Author: SKK50

Command them in and out of power armor individually or all at once. Make settlement attacks scale to be more challenging and immersive.
